WorkItem.Description:
Hi , Thanks for your Great tools.

I see a problem when select tags by XPath . 
I test my code on about 15000 pages and see this problem just on 3 pages !

in these pages : 
http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/1700
http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/2359
http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/3542

when i try this XPath -> "//div[@class='topic']/div"
htmlagilitypack must return 8 div tags , but return just first 3 div tags and ignore others !

I thought maybe it is my mistake or because of different page style, but check source code of page and test the XPath in Firebug , too .

I hope you fix it on next version , Thanks a lot.

[ Sorry for my poor english ]
